mapper.sql: id, user_name as userName, password, age
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_name, password, age) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,

age,

update user

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
